data.title: DREAM WIFE (1953) 26075
data.meta_description: Original  movie poster for DREAM WIFE (1953) 26075 MGM Original One Sheet Poster  (27x41)  Folded  Fine Plus to Very Fine Condition Offered by Kirby McDaniel MovieArt of Austin, Texas.
data.text:
MGM Original One Sheet Poster (27x41) Folded Fine Plus to Very Fine Condition

MGM Original One Sheet Poster (27x41) Folded. Cary Grant plays a businessman married to a diplomat. Their marriage is stressed and Cary tries to find true love with a princess from the fictional country of Bukistan. If this sounds silly, it is. And Cary is smoking from a hookah on the poster! After this film was made Cary Grant entered a period of self-imposed absence from films. It wasn't until Hitchcock persuaded him to make TO CATCH A THIEF that Grant was back on the screen. This poster is in very fine condition with only minimal signs of wear and some minor fold separation. MovieArt guarantees this poster to the be authentic one-sheet for this film. MovieArt Austin will sell NO reproductions.

SIDNEY SHELDON - Director

Cary Grant - Actor

Deborah Kerr - Actor

Walter Pidgeon - Actor

Bruce Bennett - Actor
